sense.gloss: burglary (of an empty house), burglar (who targets empty houses), sneak thief, prowler

sdata.e: Our house was robbed while we were away.

sdata.j: それを↑調査↑↓ちょうさ↓するのは↑退屈↑↓たいくつ↓で↑飽↑↓あ↓き↑飽↑↓|あ↓きす|る↑仕事↑↓しごと↓だ。
sdata.e: The work required to investigate that is boring and wearisome.

sdata.j: トムは↑空↑↓|あ↓き↑巣↑↓す|↓を↑捕↑↓つか↓まえた。
sdata.e: Tom caught an intruder in his house.

sdata.j: ↑空↑↓|あ↓き↑巣↑↓す|↓に↑入↑↓はい↓られたんだ。
sdata.e: Our house was robbed while we were away.
